CustomField.formula:
if( text(Sales_Person_Type__c) = "Master Data Management", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002ee5X", "MDM") , if( Profile.Name = "Call Agent", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcL", "SK")
, if( Profile.Name = "Sales Operations", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002ee5D", "Sales Ops")
,CASE(text(Primary_Business__c) , "Field Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edbm", "FS") , "Technical Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcV", "TS") , "Industrial Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edbw", "IS") , "Performance Plus Products", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcG", "PPP") , "Lodging", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edc6", "Lodging") , "Oil & Gas", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcB", "OG") , "Safety-Kleen", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcL", "SK") , "Thermo Fluids", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edcQ", "TFI") , "Emerald Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edbh", "EM") , "Healthcare Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edbr", "HS") , "Daylighting and Production Services", IMAGE("https://cleanharbors--c.na54.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150a000002edbc", "Daylighting")
,text(Primary_Business__c)) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Business
